attributes.review:
As a very traditional conservative republican, I was astonished by the quality of the app. I didnâ€™t want sleepy joe to win the election, so I decided to start supporting trump, as I wanted a real opinion on him. 
I signed up for the text messages, the emails, and got the app. I completely regret it. Not only was I bombarded with scam-y type messages telling me to â€˜donate nowâ€™ to have my name on a list of only a select few in the Presidentâ€™s Oval Office (multiple times), but I was continuously offered deals, meals, and empty promises if I gave more money to Trump. 
As someone who has taken classes on internet fraud and scams, I canâ€™t even begin to tell you how many red flags I see in all of the messages I get from this app, the email, and the text messages.
Iâ€™ve come to the conclusion that the president is a liar in every way possible, and not at all someone who I would vote for in November.
attributes.title: More information lead to misinformation (aka fake news)
